text:
Susan Weinert (June 24, 1965 – March 2, 2020) was a German jazz guitarist and songwriter. She was known as one of the masters of jazz fusion. She played over 3000 performances. On her first album in 1992, WDR radio choose "Mysterious Stories" as jazz production of the year.
Weinert died on March 2, 2020 of cancer-related problems, aged 54.
She was not the same person as author Suzi Weinert.
